name: Publishers.Debounce
desc: A publisher that publishes elements only after a specified time interval elapses between events.

items.name: init(upstream: Upstream, dueTime: Context.SchedulerTimeType.Stride, scheduler: Context, options: Context.SchedulerOptions?)
items.desc: Creates a publisher that publishes elements only after a specified time interval elapses between events.

items.name: typealias Output
items.desc: The kind of values published by this publisher.

items.name: typealias Failure
items.desc: The kind of errors this publisher might publish.

items.name: let upstream: Upstream
items.desc: The publisher from which this publisher receives elements.

items.name: let dueTime: Context.SchedulerTimeType.Stride
items.desc: The amount of time the publisher should wait before publishing an element.

items.name: let scheduler: Context
items.desc: The scheduler on which this publisher delivers elements.

items.name: let options: Context.SchedulerOptions?
items.desc: Scheduler options that customize this publisherâ€™s delivery of elements.

declaration: struct Debounce<Upstream, Context> where Upstream : Publisher, Context : Scheduler
